page.title: 11LANGUAGE_GEORDIE WORDS
page.content: People born on Tyneside are known as {Geordies.}Although Geordie dialect is spoken many words are no longer used. {GEORDIE ENGLISH GEORDIE ENGLISH bairn child hinny my dear bait box lunch box hoy throw bullets sweets hoggers pitpants canny nice hyem home claes clothes kegs trousers claggy sticky kets sweets clarty muddy liggees marbles cracket stool marra friend cuddy donkey netty toilet dunch crash oxter arm pit fash bother(v) penker big marble femmer delicate plodge paddle v foisty mouldy snagger turnip gallases braces stottie flat cake ganzie jumper tab cigarette gully knife wor lass my wife haddaway go away wotfettle how are howway come on you?
